entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
